SummaryEnglish: To be united with her crush, a hopeless romantic summons the ghost in the girls' bathroom at her school. But she's shocked when the ghost is a boy!

1.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: Hanako-kun After School/Mokke be Ambitious
1.SummaryEnglish: Nene is fed up with cleaning bathrooms, but there's no getting out of her ghostly bargain, so she seeks advice to make her chores fun. Later, the mokke attack Hanako, hoping to take his place as a Wonder. But why?

2.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: Kokkuri-san / Mitsuba's Operation: Friends
2.SummaryEnglish: Akane gathers Nene and her friends for the ultimate fortune-telling session, hoping to impress Aoi. What will his desperation conjure? Meanwhile, Mitsuba longs to make friends. But when Tsukasa offers to help, he gets more than he bargained for.

3.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: Apparition Fever / A Mokke Came Home With Me!
3.SummaryEnglish: Even apparitions can get sick, and there's a cold going around. Hanako is laid up with a fever, but he seems... delighted? Then, the youngest Minamoto finds a battered mokke on the street. How will her apparition-hunting family react?

4.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: Truth of the Mokke / Kamome Monster Nursery School
4.SummaryEnglish: Nene turns into a mokke! Descending into the bowels of the school in search of a cure, she discovers a world-shaking truth. Then, a secret agent infiltrates a nursery supposed to be raising monsters. But what are the researchers really after?

5.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: Nightmares / At the Convenience Store
5.SummaryEnglish: Nene has recently been plagued by the same recurring nightmare, and during a shopping trip, she has an unexpected encounter...

6.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: The Summer Monster: Toilet-bound Hanako-san / Return of the Summer Monster
6.SummaryEnglish: A cursed doll hits Hanako with a mysterious ray... and turns him into a girl! Nene seizes the opportunity to give her ghostly friend a makeover. Meanwhile, Tsukasa digs up the remains of the offending toy.

7.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: After-school Mokke / After-school Café
7.SummaryEnglish: Tsuchigomori discovers a strange late-night variety show all about mokke. Who would make such a thing, and who is it for? Then, Hanako becomes the manager of a ghostly café.

8.TitleEnglish: After School Hanako-kun: The Ghost Hotel
8.SummaryEnglish: Deep in a dark forest lies a hotel built, staffed, and frequented by inhuman creatures. When a lost girl stumbles through its doors, what unearthly secrets will she find within?

1.SummaryEnglish: Yashiro Nene is looking for ghostly help with her love life, but when "Hanako-san," the wish-granting spirit that haunts a girls' bathroom stall, turns out to be a boy, she may end up getting more, and less, than she bargained for.

2.SummaryEnglish: A rash of mysterious thefts hits the school, and rumor has it that the apparition "Yousei-san" is behind it. When Nene catches sight of the creature, will she end up losing more than just her school supplies?

3.SummaryEnglish: Nene's best friend vanishes without a trace and no one else remembers she ever existed! To get her friend back, Nene is forced to call on Hanako for help and journey into a "Boundary" between the world of the living and the world of the dead.

4.SummaryEnglish: Nene, Hanako, and Kou have reached the top of the Misaki Stairs, where a mysterious and bewitching woman awaits them. Will Nene get her friend back, or will she vanish along with her?

5.SummaryEnglish: The school is full on unlikely couples thanks to a tree that rumor has it makes any confession made under it succeed. When Hanako asks Nene to meet him there, Nene starts to suspect that he sees her as more than an assistant.

6.SummaryEnglish: In search of Hanako's secrets, Nene and Kou enter the fifth Wonder, the 4 O'clock Library. Its books contain the past and future of every student their school has ever had, but some knowledge comes at a price.

7.SummaryEnglish: Nene's relationship with Hanako becomes strained after she learns about his past. With some baking help from Kou, she tries to talk things out with Hanako over donuts, but their heart-to-heart is interrupted by a shocking intruder!

8.SummaryEnglish: Kou gets more than he bargained for when he tries to help a student's ghost rest in peace. The late Mitsuba may look delicate, but his language is anything but. Can Kou put up with him long enough to help him?

9.SummaryEnglish: After a surprise invitation, Nene finds herself kidnapped and taken to... a fancy tea party? Nene quickly drops her guard in coversation with the beautiful and mysterious Sakura, but is their meeting as innocent as it seems?

10.SummaryEnglish: Nene finds disembodied hands appearing in her old club photos! Then, hands start sprouting around her in real life too! They seem harmless, but is there something sinister behind them?

11.SummaryEnglish: Tsukasa rescues Nene and Mitsuba from the Hell of Mirrors, but does the mercurial ghost have something worse in store for them? Meanwhile, Hanako and Kou race to find a way to follow Nene, but will they make it in time?

12.SummaryEnglish: Nene made it back from the Hell of Mirrors in one piece, but she worries about what Hanako may be hiding from her. Just then, strange fish appear, calling her their princess and asking her to join them as the mermaid's successor.

2.SummaryEnglish:
七不思議七番目『トイレの花子さん』こと“花子くん”と縁を結んだ少女・八尋寧々。祓い屋の少年・源 光。
2人は花子くんと共に、改変された七不思議や怪異たちの噂を元に戻すため、日々奔走していた。

ある日、花子くんは言う。
七不思議の中に裏切り者がいる、と。

寧々たちは裏切り者を炙り出すため、七不思議の依代を破壊していく。
二番目『ミサキ階段』、五番目『16時の書庫』を壊し、残る七不思議は『トイレの花子さん』を含めると五つ……

一方、その裏で花子くんの弟・つかさは、七峰 桜、日向夏彦、
そして新たに七不思議三番目『カガミジゴク』となったミツバと共に、
寧々たちがまだ見ぬ七不思議に近づいて――

1.SummaryEnglish: Sudden, rapid aging wreaks havoc in Nene's and Kou's school lives. Hanako identifies the culprit as a fellow Wonder: the three Clock Keepers, rumored to control time at Kamome Academy. The trio set out to punish the offending apparition, but they'll have to find them first.

2.SummaryEnglish: One of the Clock Keepers stands revealed... as Nene's classmate Aoi Akane. Hanako proposes they work together to set things right, but past experiences have left Akane with little trust for apparitions.

3.SummaryEnglish: Nene doesn't have long to live. While Kou struggles with the revelation, Nene goes about her day none the wiser. Only she can't seem to find Hanako.

4.SummaryEnglish: Nene tries to lift Kou's spirits by inviting him to a summer festival, but Hanako has other ideas.

5.TitleEnglish: Mokke of the Dead / The Melancholy of the New Number Three
5.SummaryEnglish: A mokke escapes containment. Its bite brings disaster. Now they hunger... for candy.

6.SummaryEnglish: Nene gets to school only to find Hanako sitting in her class. Why are her friends acting like he belongs?

7.SummaryEnglish: Faced with an impossible school life, Nene and Kou enter a mysterious tower to seek the truth within.

8.SummaryEnglish: Shijima told Nene to kill Amane. Tsukasa told Nene to kill Amane. Amane took Nene stargazing.

9.SummaryEnglish: Nene drags Amane out of school and away from Shijima, but escaping a Wonder is easier said than done.

10.SummaryEnglish: When Hanako reveals the truth, Kou gets confused. Nene gets angry.

11.SummaryEnglish: Like Nene, the living Shijima is facing her own mortality, but she confronts her future—and her other self.

12.SummaryEnglish: Nene sets out to leave the painting for good, but Hanako has other ideas.

13.TitleEnglish: Final Exams and a School Sleepover
13.SummaryEnglish: Nene's life may be coming to an end, but school has her more worried than death.

14.TitleEnglish: The Near Shore and the Far Shore
14.SummaryEnglish: Nene and Akane race to rescue Aoi, only to land in hot water themselves.

15.SummaryEnglish: Nene and friends find Aoi, but she doesn't seem quite her usual self.

16.SummaryEnglish: Nene and Hanako find themselves in an unfamiliar place. A strange girl rescues them from masked villagers.

17.SummaryEnglish: While Nene and Hanako get their bearings, Aoi and Akane grapple with more personal problems.

18.SummaryEnglish: Hanako grants Nene's wish, and she's not happy about how. Now she faces a world without apparitions.

19.SummaryEnglish: Nene and Kou retrace Mitsuba's footsteps, looking for a way back to the Boundary.

20.SummaryEnglish: Nene and Kou may have found the clue they're looking for in a cursed house. But can they leave with it alive?

21.SummaryEnglish: While Teru hunts for clues at a local shrine, Nene scrambles to escape an eerily familiar cave.

22.SummaryEnglish: Kou believes they can make everything right by rescuing four-year-old Tsukasa from the Red House.

23.TitleEnglish: One-way Train to the Far Shore
23.SummaryEnglish: While Nene and friends prepare to enter the Boundary, their friends on the other side run into trouble.

24.SummaryEnglish: Nene and Kou scramble to save Hanako from Teru's wrath while the Boundary collapses around them.
